ygData.subject: Re: {General} Magic Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: The Damask Leggings are part of a Neriak Quest in which you have to have good faction with the Necro Guild to perform. You have to kill Sir Lindeal in
ygData.messageBody:
The Damask Leggings are part of a Neriak Quest in which you have to have
good faction with the Necro Guild to perform.

You have to kill Sir Lindeal in Lavastorm and bring his testimony to Loveal
S'Nez in the Lodge of the Dead, the reward is a damask armor item. I have
only done it once and i got the leggings i bet if you do it enough though
you will get the robe.


>From: rich.hitz@...
>Reply-To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
>To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqenchanters] {General} Magic Robes

>In my many wanderings of old and new characters I see
>others running around wearing very nice white, blue, and
>black robes. I have seen people /auction Damask robes
>and looking for another that I can't remember the name
>of.
>I just hit 5th last night (without using a pet up to
>now :) ) and would like to see a list of all the
>different robes available and their stats. I have a set
>of Damask pants (thanks to my wife) and would like a
>complete set. Anyone who knows what pieces are out
>there and what the benies are, please let me know.
>Also, you can spoile me as to where to acquire them
>too. :)
>
>Artimis
>Enchanter 2nd Rank
>Bretoxxulous
